bibl.title: Reading the Earliest Copies of 2 Peter.
bibl.note: Examines the work of the scribe and the meaning of 2 Peter in each of the following: the Bodmer miscellaneous codex [P72, in part. P. Bodmer VIII (= van Haelst 548; LDAB 2565)]; the Codex Sinaiticus, and the Codex Vaticanus. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Terrance Callan, Reading the Earliest Copies of 2 Peter.

Examines the work of the scribe and the meaning of 2 Peter in each of the following: the Bodmer miscellaneous codex [P72, in part. P. Bodmer VIII (= van Haelst 548; LDAB 2565)]; the Codex Sinaiticus, and the Codex Vaticanus. - Avec résumé en anglais.
